title: mystery with int array instance variable

content.question:
Consider the following instance variable and method.

What is returned by the call mystery (0, arr.length âˆ’ 1, num) ?

choices.label: The number of elements in arr that are less than num
The number of elements in arr that are less than or equal to num
The number of elements in arr that are equal to num
The index of the middle element in arr

content.answer: The number of elements in arr that are less than num

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
